participant_1.background:
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.
i have a gambling problem.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
i love cheese cake.
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i love animals , especially dogs.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I am doing pretty good! I just got back from fishing.
Oh nice! I have always wanted to try fishing but I have never had the chance.
You should give it a try! It is really fun and relaxing.
I might have to do that soon. I am looking for a new hobby.
What hobbies do you have now?
I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my son.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I love fantasy novels too! I just finished reading the Stormlight Archive series by Brandon Sanderson.
Oh I have heard good things about that series! I have been meaning to check it out.
You should definitely check it out! It is really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
